articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Pollution linked to 10% of cancer cases in Europe: Report - Times of India
articles.description: Environment News: COPENHAGEN: Pollution is linked to more than 10 percent of cancer cases in Europe, a report by the European Environment Agency said Tuesday.

articles.author: Mike Butcher
articles.title: These four iconic European founders plan to kick the asses of VCs who never started a company - TechCrunch
articles.description: Today’s launch of a new project is a tantalizing glimpse of a new wave of European VC, founded and run by former tech startup “operators.”
articles.content: Until recently, Taavet Hinrikus, co-founder of Wise, and Sten Tamkivi, co-founder of Teleport, had banded together as a sort of mini Angel brand known as Taavet+Sten. Tamkivi has done around 50 angel… [+7126 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Monkeypox case count rises to more than 3400 globally, WHO says - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: WHO says global monkeypox cases has risen to more than 3,400 with most new cases in Europe
articles.content: More than 3,400 confirmed monkeypox cases and one death were reported to the World Health Organization as of last Wednesday, with a majority of them from Europe, the agency said in an update on Monda… [+467 chars]

articles.author: Julia Horowitz
articles.title: Price cap on Russian oil could shake up the market - CNN
articles.description: Europe and the United States have barred the import of Russian oil to cut off a crucial revenue source for the Kremlin. But the plan to pile pain on President Vladimir Putin, forcing him to reconsider his war in Ukraine, hasn't worked.
